response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value for you, estimated at $1,200,000. I am extending an exclusive offer to purchase this product at a price that reflects its true worth and ensures a mutually beneficial transaction. Please consider my offer of $1,150,000. I believe this price not only represents a fair valuation but also opens up possibilities for further negotiation if needed. Should you have any questions or wish to discuss the details further, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 1150000}
